Name: Illusion
About the game: It was only after I and my buddies escaped from the terrifying laboratory that I realized that there might be a bigger conspiracy behind it. The adventure is far from over, But don't forget, what's happening here is just the beginning. game introduction Illusion is a game based on adventure puzzle solving and role-playing. Players need to collect props and crack the mechanisms throughout the game scene to complete the game. In some levels, players need to control other auxiliary characters to complete the puzzle-solving task together, and finally escape from the dangerous laboratory. In addition, each big scene will set a goal, and only after completing a specific goal can you enter the next scene. As you venture out to solve puzzles, you'll also meet new furry friends who will join you in getting through the tough times. Every choice you make in the game will set off a butterfly effect, which will then determine the direction of the game's plot and scene puzzle solving, and even the direction and even the ending of the entire game. But the ultimate goal is to escape from this laboratory.
